text: "Chance, you are an outstanding role model and an inspiration to all of us who care about our next generation. Because of you, countless young people will grow up believing in themselves, fulfilling their God given potential and then reaching back lifting up other people along the way. I can think of no better legacy to leave and I am thrilled to celebrate you here tonight and honored to call you my friend."
title: Chance the Rapper becomes youngest to receive BET Humanitarian Award

meta_data.description: At just 24 years old, Chance the Rapper is already being honored for his contribution to society.
